
```{r}

```



```{r}
BQ2raw <- read_csv(file.path(raw_data, "QuebradaCuenca2-Bisley.csv"))
```

```{r}
BQ2 <- BQ2raw %>%
  select(Sample_Date, K, `NO3-N`) %>%
    mutate(Sample_Date = (lubridate::ymd(Sample_Date))) %>%
```
